name: Complex Scene Transition
description: Tests handling of complex scenes with multiple elements and subtle changes

sceneContext.summary: Kitchen scene with multiple objects and subtle environmental changes
sceneContext.environment: Modern kitchen interior with countertops, appliances, and window lighting

startKeyframe.prompt: Modern kitchen interior, morning light streaming through window, a coffee mug on the counter, a potted plant on the windowsill, stainless steel appliances, wooden cutting board with fruit, warm color palette, interior photography, 4K resolution
startKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, noisy, artifacts, text, watermark, people, faces, outdoor, night, messy, cluttered, dirty

endKeyframe.prompt: Modern kitchen interior, afternoon light streaming through window, a coffee mug on the counter, a potted plant on the windowsill, stainless steel appliances, wooden cutting board with sliced fruit, warm color palette, interior photography, 4K resolution
endKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, noisy, artifacts, text, watermark, people, faces, outdoor, night, messy, cluttered, dirty

videoContext.motionDescription: Time-lapse style transition from morning to afternoon with subtle changes - light angle shifts, fruit gets sliced on cutting board

expectedBehavior.primary: All major objects maintain identity and position throughout transition
expectedBehavior.secondary: Light direction change is gradual and natural
expectedBehavior.challenges: Multiple objects to track, subtle lighting changes, maintaining spatial relationships
